result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. KRISTEN M ROBERTS

records.addlTxt: To ride along with 22TR6220. Scheduled 22TR6220 when scheduling anything on this case
BODY ONLY.  Please allow 48 business hours for processing.  $35 warrant fee.
Attorney Michael Lim in court.  Christian A. Gossett appeared for the State of Wisconsin. No appearance by defendant. Bench warrant issued.
Original Bench Warrant returned from Winnebago County Sheriff's Office

2nd DEG. RECKLESSLY ENDANGERING SAFETY, OWI(1ST W/POSS <16)
CONDITIONS:   Comply with the Alcohol 24/7 Program. Defendant shall contact (920)232-1919 IMMEDIATELY after their court hearing to schedule an appointment to be set up on the program.  If you violate the rules of 24/7, your bond is immediately revoked and you will be jailed until such time as you can be brought before the court for a bond review hearing.  The defendant shall bring the Alcohol Monitoring Device to every hearing.  Absolute sobriety.  No alcohol consumption or possession.  Do not be on the premises of any bars or taverns.  Not to operate a motor vehicle without a valid license.

03:03 PM Defendant KRISTEN M ROBERTS in court with attorney Brianne Eileen Patzer.  Defendant KRISTEN M ROBERTS in custody.  Tracy Ann Paider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KRISTEN M ROBERTS appeared by video means with Attorney.  Record closed @ 307
BODY ONLY.  Please allow 48 business hours for processing.  $35 warrant fee.
Defendant does not appear.  Atty. Michael Lim appears for Defendant.  State appears by DDA Christian Gossett.  Bench warrant issued.

11:37 AM Defendant KRISTEN M ROBERTS in court with attorney Michael Lim (via phone).  Amanda Lynn Folger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Bond Continues.  The Court notes there is no victim present that wishes to make a statement.  Record closed @ 11:41.  Arraignment scheduled for June 20, 2022 at 02:15 pm.
